entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued November 29 at 7:19PM AKST by NWS
entry.summary: ...Strong Storm Likely Impacting the North Slope This Weekend... A strong storm developing over the Chukchi Sea on Friday has the potential to bring high impact weather to the North Slope as it tracks east across the Beaufort Sea this weekend.
